story_ch0064_00_rival_05_04000/2401_1201: Sheesh...

OK, I get it already. C’mon. I’ll take you back
to Lear.

You may want to make another stop along
the way.
Who are you?!
Wait, you’re—
Come with me. And bring that Hoopa with you.
Absolutely not.

You’ll want to hear the rest of what I have to say,
young man.

That girl named Tina... We’ve taken her into
our custody.
What?!

As long as you come with us, we’ll assure
her safety.

But if you want your friend back, you’ll have to
trade us that Hoopa for her.
Come...by yourself.
So...don’t go asking anyone for help.
Precisely. You’re quick on the uptake.
Fine.
I don’t need anyone else’s help.
Show me to your hideout.

... ... ...
Follow me.

(I decided to be stronger so I’d be ready for
something like this.)
(I won’t be giving them Tina OR Hoopa.)
(I will never, ever...)
(lose anything again!)
